content.title: Shivam Agarwal
content.subtitle: Computer Science Researcher (Dr.)
content.text:
Hi,

I am passionate about using analytics and AI to unlock insights from complex datasets. With over 12 years of experience (in data analysis and software development), I specialize in creating and optimizing practical solutions for real-world problems.

Additionally, I bring a strong academic background (PhD) and enjoy contributing to the design and delivery of training programs to share knowledge with others.

items.title: Masters in Information Technology
items.subtitle: International Institute of Information Technology Bangalore

items.title: Senior Software Developer
items.subtitle: GraphPolaris
items.description: Contributed in curating an ETL pipeline (Python) for clients to model their existing data into graph database for analytics.

items.title: Senior Research Associate (PostDoc)
items.subtitle: University of Bamberg
items.description: Built effective solutions to analyze complex datasets, e.g., for cooperative AI behavior analysis in multi-agent scenarios. Led and collaborated on 8 multidisciplinary projects, proposing advanced techniques for analyzing AI behavior, temporal group memberships, and text cohesion in technical writing.

items.title: Research Associate (PhD)
items.subtitle: University of Duisburg-Essen
items.description: Led 9 multidisciplinary projects, developing advanced techniques for visualizing complex datasets, diagnosing AI behavior, interactive labeling, and exploring knowledge graphs.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.subtitle: Graphics Visualization Computing Lab at IIITB
items.description: Developed advanced visualizations and user interfaces to analyze complex datasets, including network logs for security incidents, oceanographic data anomalies, and multilayer network patterns. Leveraged technologies such as D3.js, Python, C++, and Qt to create efficient, interactive tools that improved data interpretation and significantly reduced customer effort in building complex test cases.

items.title: Systems Engineer
items.subtitle: Infosys Ltd.
items.description: Automated the account opening application process of a bank using Java and IBM Websphere, and developed a Java script for error log compilation and pattern recognition.

items.title: NeurIPS 2020's Flatland competition
items.description: First prize for developing innovative visual analytics solution to understand multi-agent AI cooperative behaviors in a rail-based simulation.

items.title: Best Paper Award
items.description: Recognized for novel visualization for dynamic overlapping sets at VMV conference 2020.

items.title: NeurIPS 2019's Pommerman competition
items.description: Community award (first prize) for analyzing group dynamics (competitive and cooperative behavior) in trained AI agents.
